alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Jefferson; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 8:41AM CDT until July 07 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Northeastern Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 841 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Duncan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Duncan, Marlow, Walters, Waurika, Comanche, Geronimo, Bray, Temple, Velma, Hastings, Loco, Addington, Waurika Lake, Corum, Central High, Empire City, and Hulen. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
